title: People Holding Hands Medium Skin Tone
description: Two people holding hands, both with a medium skin tone. Represents connection, partnership, and love between individuals.
apple_vendor_description: Representing unity and connection on Apple devices, the people holding hands emoji with a medium skin tone features two figures with smooth, rounded edges and realistic skin tones. Apple's expert 3D shading and subtle gradients create a sense of warmth and closeness between the individuals, their hands clasped with gentle emphasis. This emoji beautifully conveys friendship, partnership, support, and shared experiences, a testament to Apple's inclusive and emotionally resonant design.
